using CometUI;

{
	partial class #CLASSNAME# : BaseView //Autogenerated
	{
		/// <summary>Static instance of the view</summary>
		public static #CLASSNAME# Instance { get; private set; }

		// Controls
		#FIELDS#

		public override void AutoSubscribe()
		{
			#INIT#
		}

		#BUILDFIELDS#
		[VisibleInGraph(false)]
		public void Build(#BUILDSIGNATURE#)
		{
			#BUILDBODY#
			OnBuildSafe(true);
		}
		#CLONE#
	}
}

#TEMPLATE# ViewClassUser
using System;
using UnityEngine;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using UnityEngine.UI;
using CometUI;

namespace #SCENENAME#_UI
{
    partial class #CLASSNAME# : BaseView
    {
        private void Start()
        {
            //subscribe buttons or events here
			#StartBody#
		}

        protected override void OnBuild(bool isFirstBuild)
        {
			#ALLOWEDDATA#
            //copy data to UI controls here
			#OnBuildBody#
		}

		#METHODS#
	}
}

#TEMPLATE# Fields
#pragma warning disable 0414
    //[Header("Controls (auto capture)")]
	[Header("Custom")]
	#FIELDS#
#pragma warning restore 0414

#TEMPLATE# OnChanged
    protected override void OnChanged()
    {
        //copy data from UI controls to data object
        //...
        base.OnChanged();
    }

#TEMPLATE# Clone
    public override BaseView Clone()
    {
        var clone = (#CLASSNAME#)base.Clone();
		#COPYFIELDS#
		return clone;
    }
